titleStmt.title: A narration of severall passages betwixt His Maiesty and Master B. Reymes, at Newmarket, concerning the army. Communicated to the committee of the militia of London. And to the Right Honourable the House of Peeres, upon Thursday the seventeenth of June. 1647. Die Jovis, 17 Jnnii [sic]. 1647. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that this narration be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: Reymes, B.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.
City of London (England). Committee for the Militia.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
